title: Can we have a honest discussion about being banned?
body:
i probs played a hot 5k or maybe even 10k games in my lifetime on leauge of legends and i had 2 accounts banned one in season 3 or 4 when they removed chat bans, and one today.

is it actually that rare for someone to catch a ban perma? how many of you are still playing on your OG account bc honestly props to you keeping your cool with some of the degenerates you get placed with... cough cough banning someone you ask them specifically not to then being told deal with it bitch D:
